General.Name: Henan Hengxing Science & Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Henan Hengxing Science & Technology Co.,Ltd. manufactures and sells metal and chemical products in China. The company produces steel cords, hose steel wires, galvanized steel wires, galvanized steel strands, diamond wires, and other metals are used in power cables, UHV projects, automobile tires, rubber hoses, highways, high-speed railways, intercity rails,  bridges, dams, photovoltaic solar wafer cutting, and other fields. It also engages in the research and development, production, and sale of organic silicon and related products, including DMC, fumed silica, silicone rubber, silicone oil, and other products are used in construction, new energy, electronic appliances, electric power, automobile industry, track, railway transportation, medical treatment, personal care, and other industries. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Gongyi, China.
General.Address: No. 121, Yihe North Road, Gongyi, China
